data.prayer: Father, help the 5,403 believers in Moroto to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Moroto, Uganda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 5,403 believers in Moroto to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Moroto, Uganda.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the 5,403 believers in Moroto to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Moroto to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Moroto an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Moroto, Uganda.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Moroto.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Moroto, Uganda has a population of 16,300.

We estimate Moroto has 5,403 people who might know Jesus, 8,140 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,757 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
